## [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding)

### Methods

|                                                                     Method                                                                     |                                    Return type                                     |                                     Brief description                                     |
|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [copyTo(range)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#copyTo(Range))                                         | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Copies this banding to another range.                                                     |
| [getFirstColumnColorObject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#getFirstColumnColorObject())             | [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color)     | Returns the first alternating column color in the banding, or `null` if no color is set.  |
| [getFirstRowColorObject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#getFirstRowColorObject())                   | [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color)     | Returns the first alternating row color, or `null` if no color is set.                    |
| [getFooterColumnColorObject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#getFooterColumnColorObject())           | [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color)     | Returns the color of the last column in the banding, or `null` if no color is set.        |
| [getFooterRowColorObject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#getFooterRowColorObject())                 | [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color)     | Returns the last row color in the banding, or `null` if no color is set.                  |
| [getHeaderColumnColorObject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#getHeaderColumnColorObject())           | [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color)     | Returns the color of the first column in the banding, or `null` if no color is set.       |
| [getHeaderRowColorObject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#getHeaderRowColorObject())                 | [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color)     | Returns the color of the header row or `null` if no color is set.                         |
| [getRange()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#getRange())                                               | [Range](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/range)     | Returns the range for this banding.                                                       |
| [getSecondColumnColorObject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#getSecondColumnColorObject())           | [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color)     | Returns the second alternating column color in the banding, or `null` if no color is set. |
| [getSecondRowColorObject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#getSecondRowColorObject())                 | [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color)     | Returns the second alternating row color, or `null` if no color is set.                   |
| [remove()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#remove())                                                   | `void`                                                                             | Removes this banding.                                                                     |
| [setFirstColumnColor(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setFirstColumnColor(String))              | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the first column color that is alternating.                                          |
| [setFirstColumnColorObject(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setFirstColumnColorObject(Color))   | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the first alternating column color in the banding.                                   |
| [setFirstRowColor(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setFirstRowColor(String))                    | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the first row color that is alternating.                                             |
| [setFirstRowColorObject(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setFirstRowColorObject(Color))         | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the first alternating row color in the banding.                                      |
| [setFooterColumnColor(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setFooterColumnColor(String))            | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the color of the last column.                                                        |
| [setFooterColumnColorObject(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setFooterColumnColorObject(Color)) | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the color of the last column in the banding.                                         |
| [setFooterRowColor(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setFooterRowColor(String))                  | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the color of the last row.                                                           |
| [setFooterRowColorObject(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setFooterRowColorObject(Color))       | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the color of the footer row in the banding.                                          |
| [setHeaderColumnColor(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setHeaderColumnColor(String))            | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the color of the header column.                                                      |
| [setHeaderColumnColorObject(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setHeaderColumnColorObject(Color)) | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the color of the header column.                                                      |
| [setHeaderRowColor(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setHeaderRowColor(String))                  | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the color of the header row.                                                         |
| [setHeaderRowColorObject(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setHeaderRowColorObject(Color))       | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the color of the header row.                                                         |
| [setRange(range)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setRange(Range))                                     | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the range for this banding.                                                          |
| [setSecondColumnColor(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setSecondColumnColor(String))            | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the second column color that is alternating.                                         |
| [setSecondColumnColorObject(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setSecondColumnColorObject(Color)) | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the second alternating column color in the banding.                                  |
| [setSecondRowColor(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setSecondRowColor(String))                  | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the second row color that is alternating.                                            |
| [setSecondRowColorObject(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding#setSecondRowColorObject(Color))       | [Banding](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/banding) | Sets the second alternating color in the banding.                                         |
